item.title: OVROverlay Draw order
item.description: We want render clear text. we need use Oculus overlay In order what OVROverlay does. that talk about the normal drawing in Unity. Drawing order in Unity opacity geometry skybox transparent now, we have eye-buffer texture. It’s now Oculus’s part to render this texture on screen. OVROverlay ======= Draw order Gala360: Orthographic camera – render – UI Canvas => UI Texture UI Texture -> OVR Overlay -> draw as [Overlay Cylinder] 0 Cursor -> OVR Overlay -> draw as [Overlay Quad] 1 Skybox -> OVR Overlay -> draw as [Underlay Cubemap] 2
